com.generalnegentropics.archis.net
Class ArchisProtocolOutput

java.lang.Object
  com.generalnegentropics.archis.net.ArchisProtocolOutput
public class ArchisProtocolOutput
extends java.lang.Object

Protocol output handler (this handles compression and buffering too!)

Version:
1.0
Author:
Adam Ierymenko

          Sends a packet consisting of just one word (like "PONG")

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

ArchisProtocolOutput

public ArchisProtocolOutput(java.io.OutputStream outStream,
                            int blockSize)

Constructs a new protocol output

Note that blockSize should be the same on the sending and receiving ends. Use SUGGESTED_BLOCKSIZE to ensure this.

Parameters:
outStream - Underlying output stream
blockSize - Block size
